TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EntityConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class EntityConnectionStringBuilder Inherits DbConnectionStringBuilder

summary.span: 提供簡單的方式來建立和管理 EntityClient 所使用的連接字串內容。

span.span: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the EntityClient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接字串產生器 (Builder) 可讓開發人員使用類別的屬性和方法，以程式設計方式建立語法正確的連接字串，以及剖析和重新建置現有的連接字串。The connection string builder lets developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings, by using properties and methods of the class. 連接字串產生器提供強型別 (Strongly Typed) 屬性，這些屬性對應到已知關鍵字/值組。The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known keyword/value pairs. 必須建立連接字串做為應用程式一部分的開發人員可以使用 類別來建置及修改連接字串。Developers who must create connection strings as part of applications can use the class to build and modify connection strings. 執行有效關鍵字/值組的檢查，其中每組都會公開 (Expose) 為 屬性值。The performs checks for valid keyword/value pairs, each of which is exposed as a property value. > [!NOTE] > 基礎資料來源的連接字串會由 屬性提供。The connection string for the underlying data source is supplied by the property. 不會在提供的提供者連接字串中檢查有效關鍵字/值組。The supplied provider connection string is not checked for valid keyword/value pairs. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何搭配 使用 。The following example demonstrates how to use the in conjunction with a . [!code-csharp[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/CS/Program.cs#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)] [!code-vb[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/VB/Program.vb#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)]

Working with EntityClient

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何搭配 使用 。The following example demonstrates how to use the in conjunction with a . 此程式碼設定的屬性`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`來建立連接字串，提供基礎的提供者連接字串的一部分。The code sets properties of a `SqlConnectionStringBuilder` to create a connection string that supplies part of the underlying provider connection string. 請注意，無法使用設定的提供者名稱`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`因為它不是有效`SqlConnection`連接字串語法。Note that the Provider name cannot be set using the `SqlConnectionStringBuilder` because it is not valid `SqlConnection` connection string syntax. 程式碼會建立連接字串，藉由設定`EntityConnectionStringBuilder`屬性。The code creates the connection string by setting `EntityConnectionStringBuilder` properties. [!code-csharp[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/CS/Program.cs#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)] [!code-vb[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/VB/Program.vb#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)]

span.span: Connection Strings
Working with EntityClient

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string connectionString) cil managed

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 基礎資料來源的提供者特有連接字串。

span.span: A provider-specific connection string to the underlying data source.

summary.span: 使用提供的連接字串初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the supplied connection string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供`connectionString`不會檢查有效關鍵字/值組。The supplied `connectionString` is not checked for valid keyword/value pairs. 如需有效關鍵字/值的語法，請參閱 。For valid keyword/value syntax, see . 必須在指定的非變異的提供者名稱`connectionString`參數。The invariant Provider name must be specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 支援的提供者包括下列：Supported providers include the following: - `System.Data.Odbc` - `System.Data.OleDb` - `System.Data.OracleClient` - `System.Data.SqlClient` - `Microsoft.SqlServerCe.Client` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何搭配 使用 。The following example demonstrates how to use the in conjunction with a . 此程式碼設定的屬性`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`來建立連接字串，提供基礎的提供者連接字串的一部分。The code sets properties of a `SqlConnectionStringBuilder` to create a connection string that supplies part of the underlying provider connection string. 請注意，無法使用設定的提供者名稱`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`因為它不是有效`SqlConnection`連接字串語法。Note that the Provider name cannot be set using the `SqlConnectionStringBuilder` because it is not valid `SqlConnection` connection string syntax. 程式碼會建立連接字串，藉由設定`EntityConnectionStringBuilder`屬性。The code creates the connection string by setting `EntityConnectionStringBuilder` properties. 它不會使用`connectionString`多載。It does not use the `connectionString` overload. [!code-csharp[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/CS/Program.cs#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)] [!code-vb[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/VB/Program.vb#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為 包含固定大小的字典，所以嘗試加入不存在於字典中的索引鍵會擲回 。Because the contains a fixed-size dictionary, trying to add a key that does not exist in the dictionary throws a . 如需有效關鍵字/值的語法，請參閱 。For valid keyword/value syntax, see .

span.span: Invalid value in the connection string (specifically, a Boolean or numeric value was expected but not supplied).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非變異提供者名稱，可用來擷取基礎提供者的 物件。The invariant provider name is used retrieve the object for the underlying provider. 如需有效關鍵字/值的語法，請參閱 。For valid keyword/value syntax, see .

span.span: Connection Strings

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ProviderConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ProviderConnectionString : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定內部的提供者特定連接字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the inner, provider-specific connection string.

value.span: 內部的提供者特定連接字串。

span.span: The inner, provider-specific connection string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會在提供者特定連接字串設定之前，檢查其中是否有有效關鍵字/值組。The provider-specific connection string is not checked for valid keyword/value pairs before it is set. 開發人員可以使用強型別連接字串產生器 (Builder) 類別或者使用 類別建立連接字串。Developers can create connection strings by using either a strongly typed connection string builder class, or they can use the class. 不會執行任何有效關鍵字/值組的檢查。The performs no checks for valid keyword/value pairs. 因此，可能可以使用這個類別建立無效的連接字串。Therefore, it is possible using this class to create invalid connection strings. 如需有效關鍵字/值的語法，請參閱 。For valid keyword/value syntax, see .

span.span: Connection Strings

Public Overrides Function Remove (keyword As String) As Boolean

param.name: keyword
param.span: 在這個 中要從連接字串移除的關鍵字/值組的索引鍵。

span.span: The key of the keyword/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this .

summary.span: 從 執行個體移除具有指定之索引鍵的項目。

span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the instance.

returns.span: 若索引鍵存在於連接字串中，且已移除，即為 ；若索引鍵不存在，則為 。

span.span: if the key existed in the connection string and was removed; if the key did not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為`Remove`方法會傳回值，指出它的成功，它不需要尋找索引鍵，然後再嘗試移除關鍵字/值組，從執行個體。Because the `Remove` method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not required to look for a key before trying to remove the keyword/value pair from the instance.

exception.span: 為 null (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: is null ( in Visual Basic)

public: override bool TryGetValue(System::String ^ keyword, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % value);

param.name: keyword
param.span: 要擷取之項目的索引鍵。

span.span: The key of the item to retrieve.
The value corresponding to .

summary.span: 從這個 擷取對應到所提供之索引鍵的值。

span.span: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this .

returns.span: 若在連接字串中找到 ，即為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if was found in the connection string; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓開發人員安全地從 擷取值，而不必確認提供的索引鍵名稱是有效的索引鍵名稱。The method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a without having to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name. `TryGetValue` 傳遞不存在的索引鍵時，不會引發例外狀況。`TryGetValue` does not raise an exception when it is passed a nonexistent key. 呼叫`TryGetValue`具有不存在的索引鍵將 null 值 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中) 中`value`參數。Calling `TryGetValue` with a nonexistent key puts the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter.

exception.span: 包含 null 值 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: contains a null value ( in Visual Basic).
